settings.code:
Welcome Everyday Wellness Listeners!

You're on the verge of unlocking a revolutionary approach to wellness, and we're excited to accompany you on this transformative journey. As highlighted on the Everyday Wellness podcast, ProLon's Fasting Shake is not a mere product but a culmination of over two decades of extensive research.

Conducted across 14 renowned universities and spearheaded by Dr. Valter Longo—a figure celebrated as the forefather of fasting science and recognized by TIME as one of the top 50 most influential people in Health—our Fasting Shake represents innovation, dedication, and a deep commitment to enhancing well-being.
Order Now

As a thank-you for being a part of our wellness community, we're offering an exclusive 15% discount on your first ProLon order. Use code EVERYDAYWELLNESS at checkout and embark on a transformational journey with us.

Are you ready to transform your daily routine?

Our Fasting Shake is not just a beverage; it's a lifestyle choice. Infused with nourishing ingredients and backed by scientific research, it's your go-to companion for a healthier, slimmer you.

We all strive to eat the cleanest premium ingredients, help our bodies perform at their best, and age slower. Fasting Shake is the latest secret bio-hack for fat burn, performance, and a longevity lifestyle, allowing you to reap the benefits of intermittent fasting without hunger!
Order Now

settings.title: Fasting Shake
settings.product_description:
Nourish the body without the guilt! The best from nature, nurtured by ProLon longevity science. Fasting shake is the latest breakthrough in nutrition and healthy aging science.

We all strive to eat the cleanest premium ingredients, help our bodies perform at their best, and age slower. After 18 years of cutting-edge nutrition research led by L-Nutra and 14 universities, nutri-tech scientists have identified a proprietary fasting mimicking nutrition that feeds the body while not triggering the cellular nutrient-sensing pathways (NSPs). It is the latest secret bio-hack for fat burn, performance, and a longevity lifestyle, allowing you to reap the benefits of intermittent fasting without hunger!

Use Fasting Shake to replace breakfast, to extend your intermittent fasting window and fat burn, or as a snack between meals.
Vanilla flavor 14 Sachets per pouch Non-GMO Gluten-free, soy-free, dairy-free Won't break your fast! Fast for longer!

settings.title: ProLon 5-Day
settings.description:
GEN3 Soups - NEW
Red Bell Pepper & Onion, Green Pea & Chives, Lentil Curry, Chickpea & Leeks, Carrot Ginger

settings.title: Our 5-day nutrition program is the only program patented for promoting rejuvenation  from within for healthy aging.

settings.text: Discovered and developed at the Longevity Institute of the University of Southern California, our technology is plant-based nutrition that allows the body to enter into a beneficial fasting state without triggering the cells’ nutrient sensors. As the name suggests, it actually mimics fasting…while still allowing you to eat food. This nourished fasting fine-tunes cells, supports healthy aging, and eliminates the need to do a water-only starvation fast, which can have negative side effects. Take your body on a 5-day journey towards renewal.

settings.title: Transforming to a Fasting State
settings.subheading: The body transitions into a fasting state  & fat-burning mode so it can begin  cellular clean-up.

settings.title: Fat burning & Ketogenesis
settings.subheading: Fat-burning ramps up, contributing to the initiation  of ketogenesis (ketone production). By the end of  this day (48hrs), ketosis may occur.

settings.title: Autophagy / Clean-up State
settings.subheading: Cellular cleanup (autophagy) begins.  Fat-burning and ketone production/utilization  continues and increases.

settings.title: Cellular Rejuvenation
settings.subheading: Cellular cleaning/renewal & fat-burning continues. Your cells begin looking like younger versions of themselves. You're in the final stretch.

settings.title: Renewal & Change
settings.subheading: Fast completed, cellular renewal continues beyond day 5. Sustained cellular recycling, rejuvenation,  and renewal. Sustained ketosis may occur.

settings.title: Macro & micro precision nutrition keep you in a fasting state.
settings.text:
FMD is a nutrition program that contains a specific ratio, amount, and composition of plant-derived protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates.  The foods in the program nourish the body but do  not trigger the cellular food sensors known as nutrient-sensing pathways. In a nutshell, the program allows users to eat while their cells remain in a fasting state!

Each ingredient has been carefully selected, to work together to keep your body nourished during these five days. All ProLon ingredients are tested and selected.

settings.title: Trigger Autophagy - the magic of celluar rejuvenation.
settings.text:
Fasting, when done in a specific way, can trigger autophagy. Autophagy is a process in which the body cleans itself of tired, old cell parts and proteins, to make way for new, healthy ones. ProLon supports the body’s natural processes of intracellular clean-up and cell renewal.



During autophagy, cells recycle intracellular debris, and worn-out parts (organelles), so they appear to  be younger versions of themselves after the fast.

Autophagy is so important to health and longevity that research in the subject was awarded the 2016 Nobel Prize in Medicine. Simply put, autophagy is your body’s natural, too-often-untapped system for replacing and renewing old, worn out cellular components.

settings.heading: Clinically tested & proven to promote healthy aging.

settings.bdetail: IGF-1, a marker associated with aging and increased risk of cancer in mid-aged adults, was reduced by 13%.
Systolic blood pressure was reduced from  118 to 113.5 mm Hg (systolic).

settings.bdetailr: Weight loss came mostly from abdominal fat.  Participants lost an average of 5 lbs.
> 1-inch loss in waist circumference. While lean   mass was preserved.

settings.title: ProLon is Tested
settings.details: Our 5-day nutrition program is the only program patented for promoting rejuvenation from within for healthy aging.

Fasting, when done in a specific way, can trigger autophagy. Autophagy is a process in which the body cleans itself of tired, old cell parts and proteins, to make way for new, healthy ones. ProLon supports the body’s natural processes of intracellular clean-up and cell renewal.

settings.tag: Dana- ProLon user
settings.title: I really enjoyed my ProLon experience
settings.description: The soups and bars were good and I learned a ton about myself and my eating habits. I tried ProLon to get rid of some inflammation in my body, and am very happy with the results. This feels like a great reset and I'm looking forward to a healthier future. I would do it again!

settings.testimonial: ProLon carries so many weight, metabolic and cellular benefits that not only do I recommend it, but I decided to join the company’s mission full time as Chief Medical Officer
settings.author: Dr. William Hsu, M.D

settings.testimonial: I love the science supporting ProLon, and I love that the science has been published in multiple peer reviewed journals. It allows me to suggest ProLon with confidence. I have used fasting and time restricted eating in my practice for years; ProLon augments this and takes it to the next level.
settings.author: Dr. Amy Savagian, MD

settings.testimonial: Not only do I recommend ProLon as a frequent nutritional intervention, I’ve done it myself numerous times. I love this product so much, I invested in the company
settings.author: Dr. Maria Tulpan, M.D.
